name: Empty
description: Not used to designate unused area on the disk, but marks an unused partition table entry. All other fields should be zero as well.

name: DOS 12-bit FAT
description: DOS family of single-user operating systems for PCs. Type 01 is for partitions smaller than 16 MB.

name: XENIX root
description: Xenix is an old port of Unix V7. Microsoft Xenix OS was announced August 1980.

name: XENIX /usr
description: Xenix /usr partition for the old Unix V7 port.

name: DOS 3.0+ 16-bit FAT (up to 32M)
description: DOS 3.0+ 16-bit FAT partition up to 32MB. Some old DOS versions require this partition to be in the first physical 32 MB.

name: DOS 3.3+ Extended Partition
description: Supports at most 8.4 GB disks. Extended partition containing a linked list of logical partitions.

name: DOS 3.31+ 16-bit FAT (over 32M)
description: DOS 3.31+ 16-bit FAT partition over 32MB. Partitions are at most 2 GB for DOS and Windows 95/98.

name: OS/2 IFS (e.g., HPFS)
description: Installable File System. Also used for Windows NT NTFS, exFAT, Advanced Unix, and QNX2.x pre-1988.

name: OS/2 (v1.0-1.3 only)
description: Also used for AIX boot partition, SplitDrive, Commodore DOS, DELL partition spanning multiple drives, and QNX 1.x and 2.x.

name: AIX data partition
description: IBM's version of Unix. Also used for Coherent filesystem and QNX 1.x and 2.x.

name: OS/2 Boot Manager
description: OS/2 Boot Manager. Also used for Coherent swap partition and OPUS (Open Parallel Unisys Server).

name: WIN95 OSR2 FAT32
description: Windows 95 OSR2 FAT32 partitions up to 2047GB.

name: WIN95 OSR2 FAT32, LBA-mapped
description: Extended-INT13 equivalent of 0b.

name: SILICON SAFE
description: Planned by siliconsafe.

name: WIN95: DOS 16-bit FAT, LBA-mapped
description: Windows 95 DOS 16-bit FAT with LBA mapping.

name: WIN95: Extended partition, LBA-mapped
description: Windows 95 Extended partition with LBA mapping. Extended-INT13 equivalent of 05.

name: OPUS (?)
description: Maybe decimal, for type 0a.

name: Hidden DOS 12-bit FAT
description: OS/2 Boot Manager hides primary DOS partitions by changing ID. Also Leading Edge DOS 3.x logically sectored FAT.

name: Configuration/diagnostics partition
description: Used by Compaq for configuration utility partition, hibernation partition, NCR diagnostics, Intel Service Partition, and IBM Rescue and Recovery.

name: Hidden DOS 16-bit FAT <32M
description: Hidden DOS 16-bit FAT partition less than 32MB. Also AST DOS with logically sectored FAT.

name: Hidden DOS 16-bit FAT >=32M
description: Hidden DOS 16-bit FAT partition 32MB or larger.

name: Hidden IFS (e.g., HPFS)
description: Hidden Installable File System (e.g., HPFS).

name: AST SmartSleep Partition
description: Ascentia laptops Zero Volt Suspend Partition or SmartSleep Partition of size 2MB+memory size.

name: Unused
description: Claimed for Willowtech Photon coS (completely optimized system).

name: Hidden WIN95 OSR2 FAT32
description: Hidden Windows 95 OSR2 FAT32 partition.

name: Hidden WIN95 OSR2 FAT32, LBA-mapped
description: Hidden Windows 95 OSR2 FAT32 with LBA mapping. Sometimes a hidden IBM rescue partition.

name: Hidden WIN95 16-bit FAT, LBA-mapped
description: Hidden Windows 95 16-bit FAT with LBA mapping.

name: Unused
description: Rumoured to be used by Willowsoft Overture File System (OFS1).

name: Reserved
description: HP Volume Expansion, SpeedStor variant. Also claimed for FSo2 (Oxygen File System).

name: Unused
description: Claimed for Oxygen Extended Partition Table.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: NEC DOS 3.x
description: NEC MS-DOS 3.30 logically sectored FAT. MBR could have up to 8 partition entries.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: PQservice
description: Acer laptop hidden rescue partition (FAT32 or NTFS). Also Windows RE hidden partition, MirOS partition, and RouterBOOT kernel partition.

name: AtheOS File System (AFS)
description: AtheOS/Syllable OS filesystem, an extension of BeFS.

name: SyllableSecure (SylStor)
description: A variation on AthFS with added security.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: NOS
description: Operating system being developed by Alien Internet Services in Melbourne Australia.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: JFS on OS/2 or eCS
description: OS/2 Warp Server for e-Business and eComStation implementation of JFS (IBM AIX Journaling Filesystem).

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: THEOS ver 3.2 2gb partition
description: THEOS multiuser multitasking OS version 3.2 2GB partition.

name: Plan 9 partition
description: Plan 9 operating system partition. Also THEOS ver 4 spanned partition.

name: THEOS ver 4 4gb partition
description: THEOS version 4 4GB partition.

name: THEOS ver 4 extended partition
description: THEOS version 4 extended partition.

name: PartitionMagic recovery partition
description: PowerQuest PartitionMagic recovery partition used during disk operations.

name: Hidden NetWare
description: Hidden Novell NetWare partition.

name: Venix 80286
description: Very old Unix-like operating system for PCs. Also PICK multi-user operating system.

name: Linux/MINIX (sharing disk with DRDOS)
description: Old recommendation for Linux/MINIX on disks shared with DRDOS. Also Personal RISC Boot and PPC PReP Boot.

name: Linux swap (sharing disk with DRDOS)
description: Linux swap partition on disks shared with DRDOS. Also SFS (Secure Filesystem) and Windows 2000 dynamic extended partition marker.

name: Linux native (sharing disk with DRDOS)
description: Linux native partition on disks shared with DRDOS.

name: GoBack partition
description: GoBack utility partition that records disk changes for rollback capability.

name: Boot-US boot manager
description: Boot-US boot manager partition. Also Priam and EUMEL/Elan.

name: EUMEL/Elan
description: EUMEL/Elan multiuser multitasking system partition.

name: EUMEL/Elan
description: EUMEL/Elan multiuser multitasking system partition.

name: EUMEL/Elan
description: EUMEL/Elan multiuser multitasking system partition.

name: Mark Aitchison's ALFS/THIN lightweight filesystem for DOS
description: ALFS/THIN lightweight filesystem. Also AdaOS Aquila (Withdrawn).

name: Oberon partition
description: Aos (now A2) filesystem partition for Oberon operating system.

name: QNX4.x
description: QNX4.x first partition.

name: QNX4.x 2nd part
description: QNX4.x second partition.

name: QNX4.x 3rd part
description: QNX4.x third partition. Also Oberon partition for Nat filesystem.

name: OnTrack Disk Manager (older versions) RO
description: OnTrack Disk Manager read-only partition. Also Lynx RTOS and Native Oberon.

name: OnTrack Disk Manager RW (DM6 Aux1)
description: OnTrack Disk Manager read-write partition. Also Novell.

name: CP/M
description: CP/M operating system. Also Microport SysV/AT.

name: Disk Manager 6.0 Aux3
description: OnTrack Disk Manager 6.0 Auxiliary partition 3.

name: Disk Manager 6.0 Dynamic Drive Overlay (DDO)
description: OnTrack Disk Manager 6.0 Dynamic Drive Overlay.

name: EZ-Drive
description: MicroHouse EZ-Drive disk manager partition.

name: Golden Bow VFeature Partitioned Volume
description: Non-Standard DOS Volume. Also DM converted to EZ-BIOS and AT&T MS-DOS 3.x logically sectored FAT.

name: DrivePro
description: StorageSoft DrivePro partition. Also VNDI Partition.

name: Priam EDisk
description: Priam EDisk Partitioned Volume (Non-Standard DOS Volume).

name: SpeedStor
description: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor Volume (Non-Standard DOS Volume).

name: Unix System V (SCO, ISC Unix, UnixWare, ...)
description: Unix System V, Mach, GNU Hurd. UnixWare 7.1 partition must start below 4GB limit.

name: PC-ARMOUR protected partition
description: PC-ARMOUR disk protection partition. Also Novell Netware 286, 2.xx.

name: Novell Netware 386, 3.xx or 4.xx
description: Novell Netware 386 partition using Turbo FAT filesystem.

name: Novell Netware SMS Partition
description: Novell Netware Storage Management Services partition (no longer used).

name: Novell
description: Novell partition (Wolf Mountain).

name: Novell
description: Novell partition.

name: Novell Netware 5+, Novell Netware NSS Partition
description: Novell Netware 5+ NSS (Novell Storage Services) partition.
Unknown partition type, reported once.

name: DiskSecure Multi-Boot
description: DiskSecure Multi-Boot partition.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: V7/x86
description: V7/x86, a port of UNIX Version 7 to the PC.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type. Also Scramdisk partition for disk encryption software.

name: IBM PC/IX
description: IBM PC/IX partition.

name: Reserved
description: Reserved partition type.

name: M2FS/M2CS partition
description: M2FS/M2CS partition. Also VNDI Partition (not in actual use).

name: XOSL FS
description: XOSL Bootloader filesystem.

name: Unused
description: Claimed for F.I.X.

name: Unused
description: Proposed for the Alt-OS-Development Partition Standard.

name: MINIX until 1.4a
description: MINIX operating system until version 1.4a.

name: MINIX since 1.4b, early Linux
description: MINIX since version 1.4b and early Linux. Also Mitac disk manager.

name: Prime
description: Prime partition. Also Solaris x86 and Linux swap.

name: Linux native partition
description: Linux native partition supporting various filesystem types (ext2, ext3, reiserfs, etc.).

name: OS/2 hidden C: drive
description: OS/2-renumbered type 04 partition. Also Hibernation partition for laptops.

name: Linux extended partition
description: Linux extended partition.

name: Old Linux RAID partition superblock
description: Old Linux RAID partition. Also FAT16 volume set (Legacy Fault Tolerant).

name: NTFS volume set
description: Legacy Fault Tolerant NTFS volume or HPFS Fault-Tolerant mirrored partition.

name: Linux plaintext partition table
description: Linux plaintext partition table.

name: Linux Kernel Partition (used by AiR-BOOT)
description: Linux Kernel Partition used by AiR-BOOT boot loader.

name: Legacy Fault Tolerant FAT32 volume
description: Legacy Fault Tolerant FAT32 volume.

name: Legacy Fault Tolerant FAT32 volume using BIOS extd INT 13h
description: Legacy Fault Tolerant FAT32 volume using BIOS extended INT 13h.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden Primary DOS FAT12 partitition
description: Free FDISK hidden Primary DOS FAT12 partition.

name: Linux Logical Volume Manager partition
description: Linux LVM (Logical Volume Manager) partition.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden Primary DOS FAT16 partitition
description: Free FDISK hidden Primary DOS FAT16 partition.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden DOS extended partitition
description: Free FDISK hidden DOS extended partition.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden Primary DOS large FAT16 partitition
description: Free FDISK hidden Primary DOS large FAT16 partition.

name: Hidden Linux native partition
description: Hidden Linux native partition. Also Amoeba.

name: Amoeba bad block table
description: Amoeba distributed operating system bad block table.

name: MIT EXOPC native partitions
description: MIT EXOPC native partitions.

name: CHRP ISO-9660 filesystem
description: CHRP (Common Hardware Reference Platform) ISO-9660 filesystem.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden Primary DOS FAT32 partitition
description: Free FDISK hidden Primary DOS FAT32 partition.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden Primary DOS FAT32 partitition (LBA)
description: Free FDISK hidden Primary DOS FAT32 partition with LBA. Also Datalight ROM-DOS Super-Boot Partition.

name: DCE376 logical drive
description: Mylex DCE376 EISA SCSI adaptor logical drive for partitions beyond 1024th cylinder.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden Primary DOS FAT16 partitition (LBA)
description: Free FDISK hidden Primary DOS FAT16 partition with LBA.

name: Free FDISK 0.96+ hidden DOS extended partitition (LBA)
description: Free FDISK hidden DOS extended partition with LBA.

name: ForthOS partition
description: ForthOS partition (Forth operating system). Also older VSTA.

name: BSD/OS
description: Current BSD/OS partition type (BSDI).

name: Laptop hibernation partition
description: Hibernation partition for various laptops (IBM Thinkpad, Phoenix NoteBIOS, Toshiba, Sony VAIO).

name: Laptop hibernation partition
description: Save-to-Disk partition on NEC 6000H notebook. Also HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant).

name: HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant)
description: HP Volume Expansion using SpeedStor variant.

name: HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant)
description: HP Volume Expansion using SpeedStor variant.

name: BSD/386, 386BSD, NetBSD, FreeBSD
description: BSD family operating systems partition (386BSD, FreeBSD, NetBSD).

name: OpenBSD
description: OpenBSD partition. Also HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant).

name: NeXTStep
description: NeXTStep object-oriented operating system based on Mach.

name: Mac OS-X
description: Apple's OS-X (Darwin Intel) UFS filesystem partition.

name: NetBSD
description: NetBSD partition (changed from a5 since Feb 19, 1998).

name: Olivetti Fat 12 1.44MB Service Partition
description: Olivetti service partition with DOS 6.22 and utility to exchange types 06 and aa.

name: Mac OS-X Boot partition
description: Apple's OS-X (Darwin Intel) boot partition. Also GO! partition.

name: RISC OS ADFS
description: RISC OS ADFS (Advanced Disc Filing System) in FileCore format.

name: ShagOS filesystem
description: ShagOS filesystem partition.

name: ShagOS swap partition
description: ShagOS swap partition. Also MacOS X HFS/HFS+ on Intel.

name: BootStar Dummy
description: BootStar boot manager dummy partition for unused MBR entries.

name: HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant)
description: HP Volume Expansion using SpeedStor variant. Also QNX Neutrino Power-Safe filesystem.

name: QNX Neutrino Power-Safe filesystem
description: QNX Neutrino Power-Safe filesystem.

name: HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant)
description: HP Volume Expansion using SpeedStor variant. Also QNX Neutrino Power-Safe filesystem (default).

name: HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant)
description: HP Volume Expansion using SpeedStor variant.

name: HP Volume Expansion (SpeedStor variant)
description: HP Volume Expansion using SpeedStor variant. Also Corrupted Windows NT mirror set (master), FAT16.

name: Corrupted Windows NT mirror set (master), NTFS file system
description: Corrupted Windows NT mirror set with NTFS. Also BSDI BSD/386 filesystem.

name: BSDI BSD/386 swap partition
description: BSDI BSD/386 swap partition.

name: Boot Wizard hidden
description: BootWizard 4.0 and Acronis OS Selector 5.0 hidden partition.

name: Acronis backup partition
description: Acronis Secure Zone backup partition (FAT32, LBA mapped).

name: BonnyDOS/286
description: BonnyDOS/286 partition.

name: Solaris 8 boot partition
description: Solaris 8 boot partition.

name: New Solaris x86 partition
description: New Solaris x86 partition (replaces conflicting 0x82).

name: CTOS
description: CTOS partition. Also REAL/32 secure small partition, NTFT Partition, and DR-DOS/Novell DOS secured partition.

name: DRDOS/secured (FAT-12)
description: DR-DOS secured FAT-12 partition.

name: Unused
description: Reserved for DR-DOS 7+. Also Hidden Linux.

name: Hidden Linux swap
description: Hidden Linux swap partition used by Power Boot boot manager.

name: DRDOS/secured (FAT-16, < 32M)
description: DR-DOS secured FAT-16 partition less than 32MB.

name: DRDOS/secured (extended)
description: DR-DOS secured extended partition.

name: DRDOS/secured (FAT-16, >= 32M)
description: DR-DOS secured FAT-16 partition 32MB or larger. Also Windows NT corrupted FAT16 volume/stripe set.

name: Windows NT corrupted NTFS volume/stripe set
description: Windows NT corrupted NTFS volume/stripe set. Also Syrinx boot.

name: Reserved for DR-DOS 8.0+
description: Reserved for DR-DOS 8.0 and later versions.

name: Reserved for DR-DOS 8.0+
description: Reserved for DR-DOS 8.0 and later versions.

name: Reserved for DR-DOS 8.0+
description: Reserved for DR-DOS 8.0 and later versions.

name: DR-DOS 7.04+ secured FAT32 (CHS)/
description: DR-DOS 7.04+ secured FAT32 with CHS addressing.

name: DR-DOS 7.04+ secured FAT32 (LBA)/
description: DR-DOS 7.04+ secured FAT32 with LBA addressing.

name: CTOS Memdump?
description: CTOS memory dump partition.

name: DR-DOS 7.04+ FAT16X (LBA)/
description: DR-DOS 7.04+ FAT16X with LBA addressing.

name: DR-DOS 7.04+ secured EXT DOS (LBA)/
description: DR-DOS 7.04+ secured extended DOS with LBA addressing.

name: REAL/32 secure big partition
description: REAL/32 secure partition 32MB or larger. Also Multiuser DOS secured partition.

name: Old Multiuser DOS secured FAT12
description: Old Multiuser DOS secured FAT12 partition.

name: Old Multiuser DOS secured FAT16 <32M
description: Old Multiuser DOS secured FAT16 partition less than 32MB.

name: Old Multiuser DOS secured extended partition
description: Old Multiuser DOS secured extended partition.

name: Old Multiuser DOS secured FAT16 >=32M
description: Old Multiuser DOS secured FAT16 partition 32MB or larger.

name: CP/M-86
description: CP/M-86 operating system partition.

name: Non-FS Data
description: Non-filesystem data partition. Also Powercopy Backup (shielded disk).

name: Digital Research CP/M, Concurrent CP/M, Concurrent DOS
description: Digital Research CP/M family. Also CTOS and KDG Telemetry SCPU boot.

name: Hidden CTOS Memdump?
description: Hidden CTOS memory dump partition.

name: Dell PowerEdge Server utilities (FAT fs)
description: Dell PowerEdge Server utilities with FAT filesystem.

name: DG/UX virtual disk manager partition
description: DG/UX virtual disk manager partition. Also BootIt EMBRM.

name: Reserved by STMicroelectronics for a filesystem called ST AVFS
description: Reserved by STMicroelectronics for ST AVFS filesystem.

name: DOS access or SpeedStor 12-bit FAT extended partition
description: DOS access or SpeedStor 12-bit FAT extended partition on cylinders > 1023.

name: DOS R/O or SpeedStor
description: DOS read-only or SpeedStor partition.

name: SpeedStor 16-bit FAT extended partition < 1024 cyl.
description: SpeedStor 16-bit FAT extended partition less than 1024 cylinders.

name: Tandy MSDOS with logically sectored FAT
description: Tandy MS-DOS with logically sectored FAT.

name: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor
description: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor partition.

name: LUKS
description: LUKS (Linux Unified Key Setup) encrypted partition.

name: Rufus extra partition
description: Rufus partitioning software extra partition. Also Freedesktop boot.

name: BeOS BFS
description: BeOS BFS (Be File System) partition.

name: SkyOS SkyFS
description: SkyOS SkyFS filesystem based on OpenBeFS.

name: Unused
description: Planned for Sprytix OS.

name: Indication that this legacy MBR is followed by an EFI header
description: Indicates legacy MBR followed by EFI header.

name: Partition that contains an EFI file system
description: EFI (Extensible Firmware Interface) file system partition.

name: Linux/PA-RISC boot loader
description: Linux/PA-RISC boot loader partition in first 2GB of drive.

name: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor
description: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor partition.

name: DOS 3.3+ secondary partition
description: DOS 3.3+ secondary partition (Sperry IT/Unisys MS-DOS 3.xx logically sectored FAT).

name: Reserved
description: Reserved (Storage Dimensions SpeedStor).

name: SpeedStor large partition
description: SpeedStor large partition. Also Prologue single-volume partition.

name: Prologue multi-volume partition
description: Prologue multi-volume partition (1 to 10 volumes MD0-MD9).

name: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor
description: Storage Dimensions SpeedStor partition.

name: DDRdrive Solid State File System
description: DDRdrive Solid State File System (SSFS) for maximizing IOPS performance.

name: pCache
description: pCache partition (ext2/ext3 persistent cache partition).

name: Bochs
description: MandrakeSoft's Bochs x86 emulator partition.

name: VMware File System partition
description: VMware File System partition.

name: VMware Swap partition
description: VMware Swap partition (also used as VMkernel dump partition).

name: Linux raid partition with autodetect using persistent superblock
description: Linux RAID partition with autodetect using persistent superblock.

name: SpeedStor > 1024 cyl.
description: SpeedStor partition beyond 1024 cylinders. Also LANstep, IBM PS/2 IML, Windows NT Disk Administrator hidden partition, and Linux LVM (old).

name: Xenix Bad Block Table
description: Xenix Bad Block Table.
